item.title: Salmon Tataki
item.description: For 2 servings. Safety Preparation: Ensure the salmon loin has been previously frozen (minimum 48 hours at -20Â°C) for food safety, as it will be consumed almost raw. Prepare the Marinade: In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, lemon or lime juice, grated fresh ginger, and toasted sesame oil (if using). Marinate the Salmon: Submerge the clean salmon loin in the marinade. Let it marinate in the refrigerator for a maximum of 15 to 30 minutes.
